title: Grace Kelly - the American Princess
brief_description: Grace Kelly became the most sought after actress of her time and an Academy Award winner at 24. Having mastered her craft and at the height of her career, she stunned the world by choosing to leave Hollywood and become Her Serene Highness, Princess Grace of Monaco. Her remarkable story is told through film clips, home movies and interviews with Jimmy Stewart, Alec Guinness, Stanley Kramer, Louis Jourdan and others. Rated: PG
